You are a senior product designer and frontend engineer designing the main dashboard for Neuron, an AI-powered full-stack code generation CLI and backend service.Neuron helps developers:Initialize projectsAnalyze existing React + Express codebasesGenerate backend and frontend features via AITrack features added over timeVerify project health and structural issuesThis dashboard is a local developer dashboard, not a SaaS marketing site.Target users:DevelopersHackathon buildersIndie hackersFull-stack engineersTone:CleanDeveloper-firstMinimalSerious tool, not flashy startup nonsenseDASHBOARD GOALSThe dashboard must allow users to:See current project status at a glanceTrack features generated by NeuronView backend/frontend healthRun actions visually that mirror CLI commandsTrust Neuron as a reliable engineering assistantThe dashboard complements the CLI. It does not replace it.OVERALL LAYOUTLayout StructureLeft sidebar (fixed)Main content area (scrollable)Top status barSidebar NavigationInclude:Dashboard (home)ProjectsFeaturesVerificationLogs / ActivitySettingsSidebar should show:Neuron logoCurrent project nameProject path (dim text)Backend connection status (green/red dot)DASHBOARD HOME (DEFAULT VIEW)1️⃣ Project Overview CardShow:Project nameAbsolute pathFrameworks detected (React, Express, Vite, etc.)Last analyzed timestampVisual:Card with subtle borderIcons for frontend/backend2️⃣ Project Health SummaryShow health indicators based on neuron verify:Overall status:Healthy (green)Warning (yellow)Critical (red)Metrics:Missing config filesOrphan filesUnwired routesEmpty directoriesEach metric:CountSeverity colorClickable to view details3️⃣ Feature TimelineList recently added features:Each item:Feature description (natural language)TimestampFiles created/modified countBackend / Frontend tagsExample:• Add login page with email and password  7 files changed · Backend + Frontend  2025-12-21 00:10Scrollable list.Newest first.4️⃣ Quick Actions PanelButtons:Analyze ProjectBuild New FeatureVerify ProjectOpen Project FolderCopy CLI CommandButtons should feel like power tools, not toy buttons.FEATURES VIEWA dedicated page showing all generated features.Each feature card includes:Feature promptFiles createdFiles modifiedGenerated backend routesGenerated frontend componentsExpandable view:Clicking a feature shows file tree diff-styleVERIFICATION VIEWStructured issue list grouped by severity.Sections:CriticalWarningsInfoEach issue shows:TypeFile pathDescriptionRecommendationExample:[WARNING] Orphan RouteFile: src/routes/login.jsDescription: Route file exists but is not imported in app.jsNo AI opinions. Just facts.PROJECTS VIEWList all projects known to Neuron.Each row:Project namePathFeature countLast accessedCurrent indicatorAllow switching active project.LOGS / ACTIVITY VIEWTimeline of Neuron actions:initanalyzebuildverifyEach log:TimestampActionStatusDuration (if available)This builds trust.SETTINGS VIEWInclude:Backend API URLOpenAI key status (masked)Default frameworksAuto-analyze on init toggleReset project cacheVISUAL STYLEDark mode firstNeutral colors (gray, slate, subtle accent)No neonNo gradients everywhereAnimations should be subtle and functionalFonts:System UI or Inter-style fontMonospace for paths and logsIcons:Simple line iconsConsistent sizingTECH CONSTRAINTSDashboard should be buildable using:React (Vite)Tailwind or plain CSSData comes from Neuron backend APINo fake dataMust handle empty states gracefullyUX REQUIREMENTSEverything should feel instantNo unnecessary modalsClear loading statesErrors should be actionable, not vagueFINAL OUTPUT EXPECTATIONGenerate:Dashboard UI structureComponent hierarchyPage breakdownState management approachExample UI textAccessibility considerationsDo NOT:Add marketing fluffAdd social featuresAdd cloud accountsAssume multi-user SaaSThis is a local developer tool dashboard.
